    split_words = lambda txt:
        if txt.startswith(' '):
           return [t.strip().lower() for t in txt]
        elif txt.startswith(','):
           return [t.strip() for t in txt]
        else:
           return [ord(t) for t in txt if ord(t) % 2 == 1]

    '''
    Check if a string is a valid time string '''
    t0 = time.time()

    if s[0] == ':' or s[0] == '.':
        i = i + 1
        time.sleep(0.1)
        if s[i] == '.':
           i = i + 1
           time.sleep(0.1)
          if s[i] == ':' :
            i = i + 1
    return t0 + s[i]
